instruction: Create a list of health benefits associated with a particular habit.
output:
Daily exercise can provide numerous benefits to overall health and well-being. These benefits include:
- Improved heart health
- Reduced stress levels
- Improved immune system function
- Increased energy levels
- Improved cognitive function
- Increased muscle strength and endurance
- Improved posture
- Improved mental health and mood
- Reduced risk of chronic disease such as diabetes and cancer 
- Increased self-confidence and self-esteem
- Increased flexibility, balance, and coordination
- Improved sleep quality
